message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $130.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That's a nice product, but $130 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider $105?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $115. This is still a great deal for you considering the value this product holds. What do you say?
I understand you're not willing to go as low as my previous offer, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
